Classes in simsim.core used by sdm.epidemic.examples.A
AbstractNode
          The base class to extend to create new node types with some specific behavior.
Displayable
          Interface used when the implementing object needs to be drawn in a simulator window.
EndPoint
          Objects of this class represent generic transport endpoints (i.e., they are somewhat equivalent to sockets).
MessageHandler
          This interface is used whenever an incoming message arrives at a node.
Simulation
          The base class for creating a simulation application.
 

Classes in simsim.core used by sdm.epidemic.examples.B.msgs
EncodedMessage
          This interface is used to convert back a network message in some encoded format to a message object.
EndPoint
          Objects of this class represent generic transport endpoints (i.e., they are somewhat equivalent to sockets).
Message
          This class is the base class for creating the messages to be exchanged by the nodes in the simulation.
MessageHandler
          This interface is used whenever an incoming message arrives at a node.
 

Classes in simsim.core used by sdm.epidemic.examples.C
Message
          This class is the base class for creating the messages to be exchanged by the nodes in the simulation.

Simulation.DisplayFlags
           
Spanner
          Creates a simplified graph covering all the nodes in the network.
Task
          This is the base class for creating tasks in the simulator.
TcpChannel
          This class implements blocking network operations, allowing a message to be sent and replied-to within a channel.
